metaTags.metaDescription: For small eCommerce websites and businesses requiring advanced security and performance, PCI compliance, and prioritized email support. See what is included in Cloudflare's Business Plan.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Business Plan for only $200/month
relatedBlades.copy: For small ecommerce websites and businesses requiring advanced security and performance, PCI compliance, and prioritized email support.

relatedBlades.title: What you get with the Business Plan

features.title: Unmetered mitigation of DDoS attacks
features.description: Backed by a full SLA, Cloudflare DDoS experts will keep you online 24/7/365 no matter the size, type, or duration of attack.

features.title: Global content delivery network (CDN)
features.description: Improve latency and performance with location-based access to your website using our data centers located around the globe.

features.title: Web application firewall
features.description: Defend your website against application attacks with Cloudflare rulesets, OWASP ModSecurity rulesets, and up to 25 custom rulesets.

features.title: Custom SSL certificate upload
features.description: Secure the transfer of data between you and your website visitors by uploading your own custom SSL certificate to Cloudflare.

features.title: PCI compliance
features.description: Bring your business into compliance with the latest PCI standards by enabling the Cloudflare WAF and Modern TLS Only mode.

features.title: Prioritized customer support
features.description: Get professional support when you need it with prioritized customer support via chat and ticket. Average ticket response time of less than 8 hours for urgent issues.

relatedBlades.title: Plus These Features
keyFeature: Prioritized support via chat and email
Accelerate delivery of dynamic content with [Railgun™](https://www.cloudflare.com/website-optimization/railgun/)

cellsInRow.cellText: For companies requiring enterprise-grade security and performance, prioritized 24/7/365 phone, email, or chat support, and guaranteed uptime.
For small eCommerce websites and businesses requiring advanced security and performance, PCI compliance, and prioritized email support.
Unmetered mitigation of DDoS attacks with network prioritization
Data centers in hundreds of cities across the world to cache static content
Data centers in hundreds of cities across the world to cache static content
Enterprise-grade phone, chat, and ticket support
100% uptime and 10x reimbursement (25x for Premium Offering)
Custom pricing with unlimited scripts and negotiable CPU time

$5/month

(Up to 10 Million requests, additional requests are billed at $0.50 per million requests)

relatedBlades.title: Get more from Cloudflare
relatedBlades.description: Take your performance and security even further with Cloudflare's paid add-ons for Free, Pro, and Business plans.

content.value: Argo is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely. Argo includes: Smart Routing and Tiered Caching.
Advanced Certificate Manager is a flexible and customizable way to issue and manage certificates in Cloudflare.
Cloudflare Workers lets developers deploy serverless code written in JavaScript, Rust, C, and C++ to Cloudflare's edge, closer to the end user.
Cloudflare Access protects internal resources by securing, authenticating and monitoring access per-user and by application.

Load Balancing safeguards from service disruptions with local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.
Cloudflare Stream makes streaming high quality video at scale, easy and affordable.
Rate Limiting protects against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force password attempts, and other types of abusive behavior targeting the application layer.

addOns.title: Image Resizing

content.value: Resize images for a variety of device types and connections from a single-source master image. Images can be manipulated by dimensions, compression ratios, and format (AVIF and WebP conversion where supported).

addOns.pricingText: 50,000 monthly resizing requests included with Pro, Business. $9 per additional 50,000 resizing requests.

content.value: Page Rules allow you to customize Cloudflare's functionality to match the unique needs of your domain or subdomain, helping to optimize speed, harden security, increase reliability, maximize bandwidth savings, and much more.
Cloudflare Apps is a simple and powerful way for millions of site owners to get access to tools previously only available to technical experts.

You pay what we pay — you won't find better value. Cloudflare Registrar securely registers and manages your domain names with transparent, no-markup pricing that eliminates surprise renewal fees and hidden add-on charges.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
